snippet.title: Grifford Academy - Official Trailer | Dames 4 Games Showcase March 2024
snippet.description:
Please help support us by wishlisting Grifford Academy today! 🏒
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2445780/Grifford_Academy/

Immerse yourself in an empowering coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Explore the young minds of a diverse group of friends as the secrets of the book unfold. Will Erika, Viva and Cap learn to embrace each other's strengths amidst the challenges they face?📖

We're LandShark Games, a Singapore-based game studio behind Aviator, Monster Candy, and the popular Zen Koi series. Our goal is to bring engaging titles to the gaming community. 🦈

#indiegame #madewithunity 

💻 Website: https://griffordgame.com/
🤝 Discord: https://discord.gg/yNaT8stev2
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/LandShark_Games
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/landsharkgames/
📕 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LandSharkGamesCompany
